statements: SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Access_Control;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_id, role_name, permission_level FROM IoT_Access_Control ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, role_name FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, role_name FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT device_id, device_name, role_name FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE permission_level > 3 GROUP BY device_type
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE device_type = 'Sensor' LIMIT 3
SELECT AVG(permission_level) AS avg_perm_level, MAX(permission_level) AS max_perm_level FROM IoT_Access_Control WHERE device_name LIKE 'Door%'
SELECT * FROM IoT_Devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_Devices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoT_Devices ORDER BY location;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM IoT_Devices WHERE device_type = 'actuator' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT AC.user_id, AC.role, ID.device_name FROM Access_Control AC JOIN IoT_Devices ID ON AC.device_id = ID.device_id;
SELECT * FROM Access_Control WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY role DESC, device_id
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Devices WHERE location = 'Living Room'
SELECT user_id, role, device_type, location FROM Access_Control INNER JOIN IoT_Devices ON Access_Control.device_id = IoT_Devices.device_id
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM IoT_Devices ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT device_name, COUNT(user_id) AS num_users FROM Access_Control INNER JOIN IoT_Devices ON Access_Control.device_id = IoT_Devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING num_users > 1
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_id = '3c6e00d7-2977-4675-9521-18ce6488ab13';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Laptop' AND device_name LIKE '%Lenovo%';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC, device_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM roles LEFT JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.role_id;

SELECT devices.device_name, devices.device_type, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM devices JOIN permissions ON devices.device_id = permissions.device_id JOIN roles ON permissions.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE devices.device_type = 'Laptop';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Device WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, mac_address FROM IoT_Device WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM IoT_Device WHERE mac_address LIKE 'AA:%';
SELECT * FROM Device_Access WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_name, mac_address FROM IoT_Device ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_level FROM Device_Access WHERE user_id = 101 AND access_level = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoT_Device WHERE status = 'active' AND device_type = 'actuator';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, d.device_name FROM User_Accounts u JOIN User_Roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN IoT_Device d ON d.device_id = (SELECT MAX(device_id) FROM IoT_Device);
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type = 'Camera' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoleMapping ON Users.user_id = UserRoleMapping.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoleMapping.role_id = Roles.role_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, device_location FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type LIKE '%sensor%' ORDER BY device_location ASC, device_name ASC;
